title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
OB: When I remove a working set, the package view in the background refilters. Additionally, pressing cancel does not cancel the removal of the working set.
EB: When I remove a working set, the package view should not immediately refilter. Refiltering should only occur when closing the working set selection dialog. Also, pressing cancel should cancel any changes made to the working sets, including the removal.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open the working set selection dialog.
3. Remove a working set.
4. Observe that the package view immediately refilters.
5. Press cancel and verify that the removal of the working set is cancelled.
